nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi Activity Book with Stickers
Star Wars: The Last Jedi Activity Book with Stickers is an activity book based on Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. The book was released on December 15, 2017, the same day as the film itself.
Explore the world of Star Wars: The Last Jedi in this exciting activity book, packed with mazes, code words, puzzles and many more activities, plus 3 sticker scenes to complete and over 50 stickers!
